entry.title: Hidden Yearnings
entry.summary:
Author: robinkink

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,293Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 63

Summary: “Like what?” he asked, his voice deliberately low, his breath ghosting over Tim’s face. Tim didn’t answer right away. Instead, his fingers slipped under the hem of Damian’s shirt, tracing a slow, calculated path along his skin. Every touch was intentional, a deliberate attempt to crack the perfect mask of control Damian wore so well. “Submissive,” Tim whispered the word like a secret. And it was — a forbidden intimacy between two boys, especially two who were, at least on paper, brothers. Tim didn’t care about that now. entry.title: chaos, crowned.
entry.summary:
Author: lastbudnotleast

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,659Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 45

Summary: "So here I am, at probably the worst school in the country. Whose alumni are nothing but arms dealers, serial killers, and corporate lawyers. Real scum. And that old creep thinks he can tame me? We shall see, my friend. I only give people what they have coming to them." - Tim DrakeTim knew from the start that enrolling in Gotham Academy would be pure hell—and he was right. Every hallway, every sneer, every shadow confirmed it. But everything shifted the moment he met Damian Wayne. Something in him changed, though whether for better or worse, even he couldn’t say.

entry.summary:
Author: singformeangel

Summary: Desperate to prove his superiority (and thoroughly disgusted by Drake's continuous lack of self-preservation) Damian sets out to obtain picture evidence of Drake's inadequacy.
